_comment: V1.6.0: Scrape configuration for supplier websites. Pattern: 'direct' = single price, 'table' = tiered pricing. pricePath = custom URL path for price page.

_ignore_list._comment: Suppliers we will NOT add - do not contact or re-evaluate
_ignore_list.paragonoil.com: Not COD - requires account/contract. Serves NYC 5 boroughs + Westchester.
_ignore_list.huntingtondiscountoil.com: Dole Fuel Oil - no price found on site.
_ignore_list.affordablefuels.com: No phone number on site - cannot verify business.
_ignore_list.sosxtremecomfort.com: HVAC company - not primarily heating oil.

_aggregator_note: V2.1.0: Aggregator prices are used for market signals only. Never displayed to users. displayable: false is REQUIRED.
